strapiEvent.name: Foreigner at the Walmart AMP
strapiEvent.description:
Iconic rock group Foreigner will make one last visit to the Walmart AMP as part of their Historic Farewell Tour with Loverboy on Jul 14.

  • Chart-toppers: Launched by three Englishmen and three Americans, Foreigner rocked the 70s and 80s with some of rock and roll’s most enduring anthems — like Juke Box Hero, Cold As Ice, Hot Blooded, Waiting For A Girl Like You, and the worldwide No. 1 hit, I Want To Know What Love Is.
  • I wanna know: Don’t miss this last chance to rock out with Foreigner as they make a stop at the Walmart AMP with Loverboy on Jul 14. Perhaps after all these years, they will tell us if they ever found out what love is.

Get your Foreigner Farewell Tour tickets HERE.
